column3: slender tree such as an [[ashes|ash]] or [[birches|birch]]. Compare with ''[[orn]]'' in [[Sindarin]].<ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}

column1: [[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested that the form ''ornë'' (retaining the same meaning) could be valid [[Neo-Quenya]].<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]]
column2: "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 25 June 2011)</ref>
